dcterms:creator: M. Defferrard
K. Benzi
P. Vandergheynst
X. Bresson
dcterms:description: The GTZAN dataset is a collection of 10 popular genres (blues, classical, country, disco, hip-hop, jazz, metal, pop, reggae, rock) with 100 audio files each, all having a length of 30 seconds.
dcterms:title: GTZAN Dataset

dcterms:creator: U. Marchand
G. Peeters
dcterms:description: The extended ballroom dataset includes 4180 30-second tracks covering 13 distinct genres, representing an improvement to the original ballroom dataset with about six times the number of tracks and superior audio quality.
dcterms:title: Extended Ballroom Dataset

dcterms:creator: H. Homburg
I. Mierswa
B. MÃ¶ller
K. Morik
M. Wurst
dcterms:description: The HOMBURG dataset consists of 1886 songs taken from the Garageband site and classified into nine unbalanced genres. Each sample lasts for 10 seconds.
dcterms:title: HOMBURG Dataset

dcterms:creator: M. Defferrard
K. Benzi
P. Vandergheynst
X. Bresson
dcterms:description: The Free Music Archive (FMA) dataset is a large and diverse dataset comprising four subsets: Full, Large, Medium, and Small, with the Small set containing about 8,000 tracks of 30s songs distributed over eight balanced genres.
dcterms:title: Free Music Archive (FMA) Dataset
